movies.title: Yellowstone
movies.description: John Dutton, patriarch of a Mountain ranching family and owner of the largest ranch in the US, fights to defend his land and his family from the modern-day forces that threaten his way of life: land developers, an Indian reservation and America's first National Park.

movies.title: The Hateful Eight
movies.description: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive are caught in the middle of a snowstorm. They seek refuge at a small lodge and encounter a twisted turn of events there.

movies.title: Armed and Dangerous
movies.description: Events taking place at the end of the 19th century in the Wild West in America. The plot — the complex vicissitudes of life of hard workers — a prospector Gabriel Conroy. Having found oil on his land, he knows happiness and disappointment, and danger, and despair.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: When Django, a slave, is freed, he joins forces with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife, who has been enslaved by Calvin, a hard-hearted plantation owner.

movies.title: Rocketman
movies.description: After completing his studies, Reginald begins to perform rock music at local pubs. Later, he meets John Reid, a music manager, who helps him rise to fame, but also creates chaos in his life.

movies.title: Burlesque
movies.description: Ali leaves her job as a waitress to pursue a career on stage. After failing the audition, she wanders into a club where, after a long struggle, she not only becomes a lead dancer but also a singer.

movies.title: Chicago
movies.description: Nightclub sensation Velma kills her philandering husband. Chicago's adroit lawyer, Billy Flynn, is set to become her defence lawyer, who also defends Roxie, under trial for murder.

movies.title: Moulin Rouge
movies.description: Christian, an English writer, travels to Paris to join the Bohemian revolution. He visits the city's biggest night club, Moulin Rouge, and falls in love with its star performer and courtesan, Satine.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: Andrew enrols in a music conservatory to become a drummer. But he is mentored by Terence Fletcher, whose unconventional training methods push him beyond the boundaries of reason and sensibility.

movies.title: Italo Disco Legacy
movies.description: A journey into the past and the future of Italo Disco music through the stories of the original 80's heroes and cult DJs and the voice of the new generation of artists, radio broadcasters and fans ready to carry on the Italo Disco Legacy.

movies.title: Walk the Line
movies.description: Johnny Cash, an aspiring musician, receives a golden opportunity to tour with the famous June Carter. As Johnny's musical career takes a flight, his marriage with Vivian starts falling apart.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: Paul Atreides arrives on Arrakis after his father accepts the stewardship of the dangerous planet. However, chaos ensues after a betrayal as forces clash to control melange, a precious resource.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: When Sebastian, a pianist, and Mia, an actress, follow their passion and achieve success in their respective fields, they find themselves torn between their love for each other and their careers.

movies.title: Leto
movies.description: A love story set against the backdrop of a pivotal moment in Russian culture, Leto captures people -- and a generation -- in thrilling flux

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: Jack and his family move into an isolated hotel with a violent past. Living in isolation, Jack begins to lose his sanity, which affects his family members.

movies.title: Venom
movies.description: While trying to take down Carlton, the CEO of Life Foundation, Eddie, a journalist, investigates experiments of human trials. Unwittingly, he gets merged with a symbiotic alien with lethal abilities.

movies.title: Donnie Darko
movies.description: Donnie Darko, an awkward teenager, befriends Frank, a figure in a bunny costume only he can see, who informs Donnie that the world will end in 28 days, 6 hours, 42 minutes, and 12 seconds.

movies.title: Soul
movies.description: Joe is a middle-school band teacher whose life hasn't quite gone the way he expected. His true passion is jazz -- and he's good. But when he travels to another realm to help someone find their passion, he soon discovers what it means to have soul.

movies.title: A Monster in Paris
movies.description: Raoul is a delivery boy by day and an amateur scientist at night. One of Raoul's many experiments goes wrong and a tiny flea finds itself caught in the middle.

movies.title: Ooops! The Adventure Continues
movies.description: Adrift on a flood, two misfit castaways struggle to reunite an unorthodox family, out-run a volcano, and negotiate a peace deal on a creaking Ark.
